channel.title: Compiler, no help so far
channel.description:
YES I SEE ALL COMPILER QUESTIONS GO HERE...NO ONE WILL RESPOND
my compiler code: [code=text]@echo off title owned if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]
I've been seaching for a while now, I do have the LATEST version of java, here is what it says after i compile: [code=text]javac: file not found:*.java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a possible list of options Finished! Press any key to continue...[/code]
please help me i'm not the best at this.[code=qbasic][/code]
i get this same messag with OTHER servers and it changes but on this 508 server it doesn't

item.title: Compiler, no help so far
item.dc:creator: @I_Ashley_I I Ashley I
item.description:
@I_Ashley_I wrote:

use your old one.

@echo off title owned if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

If that doesn’t work then tell me.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler, no help so far
item.dc:creator: @I_Ashley_I I Ashley I
item.description:
@I_Ashley_I wrote:

K follow what i do.

Go to the Control Panel on your Computer.
Find System.
Advanced and you will see Environment Variables.
Click that and then click New.

Now add this.

Varaible Name: CLASSPATH
Varabile Value: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

jdk1.6.0_07 - Is the version of your JDK. Change it to your version if need to be.

Now click New again and add this below.

Varaible Name: CLASSPATH
Varaible Value: .;C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip

jre6 - is the version of your JRE. Change it if need to be.

Any problems? Post them here.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler, no help so far
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“I Ashley I, post:2, topic:339013”]Edit the compiler

And copy & paste this in there.

[quote]@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause[/quote][/quote]

That’s for running the bytecode…
